Starting from the home screen
Click the floating action button "+"
A bottom sheet will appear, click the folder button
A dialog box will appear, enter the folder name
Click the create button
The created folder will appear in the home page. Folders can also be created inside folders by repeating the steps from inside a folder
Starting from the home screen
Click the floating action button "+"
A bottom sheet will appear, click the "Scan Text" button
You will be redirected to the image scanner screen. You can use the camera by clicking the camera button
But you can also select image from the gallery by clicking the upload button
The camera will open up when you choose to click the camera button
After shooting a picture, crop the image to fit the text inside the image
Wait for the OCR feature to extract the text from the image and redirect you back to the image scanner screen, but now with the extracted text included to the editor
You can hit the "reset" button to clear the text
You can save the text by hitting the "check" button
Upon hitting the "check" button, a menu will pop up to choose which file type to save the text
After choosing the desired file type, enter the filename
Click the save button and wait for a "File uploaded successfully" message
You can now go back to the home screen and refresh by pulling down on the screen
To view the file, simply click the file
